titles: A new treatise of natural philosophy, free'd from the intricacies of the schools adorned with many curious experiments both medicinal and chymical : as also with several observations useful for the health of the body.
author: Midgley, Robert, 1655?-1723.
publisher: Printed by R.E. for J. Hindmarsh ...,
